No, I meant Alloran2's two chars. Ramulus is the one speaking with Astrol and 
Fenox.

::Shredder/Ramulus::

Shredder shakes his head, glancing at Mantella. "We don't really have a 
functional base. I don't think a mission would be all that great."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus shakes his head, chuckling at SnowCat. "I'm not going back there any 
time soon! I'm even gonna stop jumping for a bit!"

He looks back at the Ark, hearing IRIS's responce. "There was a battle a 
short time ago," he says, "Do you have scans for any unusual weapons that 
were used in it? Namely mind controll devices, probably chips?"

He looks up as the two bots, Astrol and Fenox, fly up, sighing in both relief 
and annoyance. New troops were always welcome, but interruptions....

"Yes, a temporary truce will be good," he replies over his comm, "We might 
need some help soon. Are your troops willing to fight?"
